participant_1.background:
I'm still looking for my favorite place to eat, but I'm always up for trying new things.
I will tell my kids about my experience and inspire them to overcome their fears.
I wake up and greet my dog, the best friend I could ever ask for.
I take my pets to my lake in the backyard every day and watch them swim as I drink tea.
i could eat meatloaf every night and never get tired of it.

participant_2.background:
I'm an active person who enjoys working with my hands and spending time outdoors.
I love to take weekend trips to explore new places and write about my experiences.
i like collecting rocks.
I love to sing karaoke and get my heart rate up with archery.
I like to keep my hair natural, but if I were to dye it, I would choose a deep auburn shade.

content.text: Hello! I'm doing well, how about you?
I'm doing great! I just got back from a trip to the mountains.
That sounds amazing! I love the mountains. I'm an active person who enjoys working with my hands and spending time outdoors.
That's awesome! I'm more of a homebody, but I do enjoy taking weekend trips to explore new places.
I love that! I'm always looking for new places to go and things to do. I also love to write about my experiences.
That's cool! I'm not very good at writing, but I love to read.
I love to read too! What are some of your favorite books?
I like to read a variety of books, but I especially love historical fiction and mystery novels.
Me too! I love to learn about different cultures and time periods.
Me too! I also love a good mystery.
Me too! I love trying to figure out who did it before the end of the book.
Me too! I love the feeling of satisfaction when you finally figure it out.
Me too! I think we'd be good friends.
